data.name: Hazard Perception Test UK 2017/18 Bundle - Driving Test Success
data.detailed_description:
Join the 11 MILLION learners we’ve helped to prepare for their test!

Download the Driving Test Success Hazard Perception bundle direct to your Windows PC, laptop or netbook and gain the essential training you need to pass the Hazard Perception Test FIRST TIME.

This bundle contains over 160 interactive hazard perception video clips that will help you to prepare for the second part of the official DVSA Theory Test.

Key features:
  • Practise over 160 interactive video clips (80 videos in Volume 1 and 80 videos in Volume 2)
  • Sit unlimited mock tests to help prepare you for the OFFICIAL DVSA test
  • Review each video clip to help improve your skills
  • Cheat detection just like in the real test
  • Detailed progress monitor
  • Expert advice

Suitable for:
  • Car Drivers
  • Motorcyclists
  • LGV & PCV Trainee Drivers
  • ADIs/Trainee ADIs
  • LGV Registered Drivers

data.short_description: Join the 11 MILLION learners we’ve helped to prepare for their test! Download Driving Test Success Hazard Perception and get unlimited access to all the essential training tools you need to pass the official DVSA Hazard Perception Test FIRST TIME.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (SP1), 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Pentium® (2009)/Core i3® 2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Direct3D 9 compatible graphics card with at least 128MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX 9 compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for installation, updates, web media and web links. Internet Explorer 9 or higher. Windows Media Player 12 (or Media Feature Pack if using Windows N editions).
